bibl.title: Imported Cults.
bibl.note: Historical frame: Imported cults in pharaonic Egypt. - A new situation: The Graeco-Macedonian conquest. - Imported cults in Roman Egypt: What's new? - Sources, scope, and method. - Interactions between imported cults and the native pantheon. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: Tallet Gaëlle et Christiana Zivie-Coche, Imported Cults.
Christina Riggs (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt (Oxford, 2012) pp. 436-456, 5 figg.

Historical frame: Imported cults in pharaonic Egypt. - A new situation: The Graeco-Macedonian conquest. - Imported cults in Roman Egypt: What's new? - Sources, scope, and method. - Interactions between imported cults and the native pantheon. - Conclusion.
